SEARCH
Package model

Klasse Ring

java.lang.Object
model.Ring
public class Ring extends Object
Represents the current status of the playing field and associated informations.
  • the node list
  • the maximum number of fernies per node (final)
  • the numbers of fernies that are currently free and ready to be placed
  • the maximum number of fernies that the agent has available this round (new fernies + all fernies on nodes owned by the agent)

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Ring

      public Ring(Node[] nodeList, int maxFerniesPerNode, int availableFernies)
      Creates a new Ring.

      After initialization, the ring contains a Node array in which the nodes are stored in ascending order by their node number, the number of new fernies for the current round, the maximum number of fernies allowed per node, and the maximum number of fernies available for the current round (number of new fernies + number of fernies already owned by the agent).

      Parameter:
      nodeList - the nodes of the ring, sorted by node number
      maxFerniesPerNode - the maximum number of fernies allowed on a node
      availableFernies - the newly received fernies in the current round

    • getInvisibleForOpponent

      public List<Node> getInvisibleForOpponent(int visibility)
      Returns the list of nodes that are invisible to the opponent. The visibility used is the one calculated at the beginning of each round by Util.
      Parameter:
      visibility - the visibility radius
      Gibt zurück:
      nodes that are invisible to the opponent

    • getVisibleForOpponent

      public List<Node> getVisibleForOpponent(int visibility)
      Returns the list of nodes that belong to the agent and are visible to the opponent. The visibility used is the one calculated at the beginning of each round by Util.
      Parameter:
      visibility - the visibility radius
      Gibt zurück:
      nodes that are visible to the opponent

      Gibt zurück:

    • attack

      public void attack(int nodeNumber, int fernies) throws MoveException
      Attacks an opponent's node with a specified number of fernies. The number of available fernies is decremented accordingly.

      If the targeted node does not belong to the opponent or another invalid move is attempted, a MoveException is thrown.

      If the number of fernies placed on the node minus the opponent's fernies exceeds the maximum number of fernies allowed per node, the attack is carried out only with the maximum possible number of fernies.

      Parameter:
      nodeNumber - the number of the node to be attacked
      fernies - the number of fernies to place on the targeted node
      Löst aus:
      MoveException - if the move on this node is invalid

    • addFernies

      public void addFernies(int nodeNumber, int fernies) throws MoveException
      Places fernies on a node. The number of available fernies is decremented accordingly.

      If an invalid move is attempted, a MoveException is thrown.

      If the number of fernies to be placed on the node plus the fernies already present on the node exceeds the maximum number of fernies allowed per node, only the maximum possible number of fernies is placed on the node.

      Parameter:
      nodeNumber - the number of the node on which fernies should be placed
      fernies - the number of fernies to place on the node
      Löst aus:
      MoveException - if the move on this node is invalid

    • removeFernies

      public void removeFernies(int nodeNumber, int fernies) throws MoveException
      Removes fernies from a node owned by the agent. The number of available fernies is incremented accordingly.

      If an attempt is made to remove fernies from a node not owned by the agent, or to remove more fernies than are present on the node, a MoveException is thrown.

      Parameter:
      nodeNumber - the number of the node from which fernies should be removed
      fernies - the number of fernies to remove
      Löst aus:
      MoveException - thrown if an invalid move is performed

    • getVisibilityPercentage

      public float getVisibilityPercentage()
      Returns how much of the ring is visible.
      Gibt zurück:
      visibility ratio of the ring

    • isRingFull

      public boolean isRingFull(Owner owner)
      Returns whether all nodes owned by a given owner are occupied to maximum fernie capacity.
      Parameter:
      owner - the owner
      Gibt zurück:
      true if all nodes by the owner are fully occupied, false otherwise

    • getMinNode

      public Node getMinNode(Owner owner)
      Returns the node with lowest fernie count by a given owner. If there are several nodes with the same lowest fernie count, a random node is selected.
      Parameter:
      owner - the owner
      Gibt zurück:
      the/a node with the lowest fernie count by the owner

    • getMinNode

      Parameter:
      list - the node list
      Gibt zurück:
      the node with the lowest fernie count

    • getMaxNode

      public Node getMaxNode(Owner owner)
      Returns the node with highest fernie count by a given owner. If there are several nodes with the same highest fernie count, a random node is selected.
      Parameter:
      owner - the owner
      Gibt zurück:
      the/a node with the highest fernie count by the owner

    • getMaxNode

      public Node getMaxNode(List<Node> list)
      Returns the node with highest fernie count from a given node list.
      Parameter:
      list - the node list
      Gibt zurück:
      the node with the highest fernie count

    • getMaxFerniesThisRound

      public int getMaxFerniesThisRound()
      Returns the maximum number of fernies that the agent has available this round, i.e. the new fernies and the sum of fernies on nodes owned by the agent.
      Gibt zurück:
      maximum number of available fernies

    • getNodesFreeNeighbors

      public List<Node> getNodesFreeNeighbors(int forwards, int backwards)
      Returns a list of nodes owned by the opponent which have a given numbers of free neighbors in both directions.
      Parameter:
      forwards - required free nodes forwards
      backwards - required free nodes backwards
      Gibt zurück:
      node list

    • getNodesFreeNeighbors

      public List<Node> getNodesFreeNeighbors(int neighbors)
      Returns a list of nodes owned by the opponent which have a given number of free neighbors in one direction.
      Parameter:
      neighbors - required free neighbors in one direction
      Gibt zurück:
      node list

    • calcUnnecessary

      public int calcUnnecessary()
      Returns the number of fernies that are available if all but one fernie is removed from nodes owned by the agent.
      Gibt zurück:
      available fernies

    • checkForNeighbors

      public boolean checkForNeighbors(Node node)
      Checks whether the nodes on either side of a given node are occupied by the opponent. This serves to avoid unintended edge battles.
      Parameter:
      node - node which should be checked for neighbors
      Gibt zurück:
      true if opponent occupies neighboring nodes, else false

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the ring as String in the format of a step file. This method is used to save the ring at the end of a turn in the prediction file.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      toString in Klasse Object
      Gibt zurück:
      ring as String
